restClient.title: Client
restClient.networkError: Network error. Could not send request

Uladzimir Hancharou.0: Developed RESTful client pages and history.
Uladzimir Hancharou.1: Implemented debounce to reduce the amount of rerendering.
Uladzimir Hancharou.2: Implemented auto-generation of code via postman-codegen.
Uladzimir Hancharou.3: Implemented display of the response from the server.
Uladzimir Hancharou.4: Implemented support for variables in queries.
Uladzimir Hancharou.5: Implemented query history using LocalStorage for storage and recovery.

Liudmila Burbouskaya.0: Developed a login and register page.
Liudmila Burbouskaya.1: Added adaptive navigation to the header for mobile or desktop devices.

Marharyta Parkalava.0: Developed the main page, header/footer, page with variables.
Marharyta Parkalava.1: Implemented functions for storing variables in LocalStorage, as well as adding and deleting variables.
Marharyta Parkalava.3: Created a design system of reusable components.
